Accept the Challenge (It starts in 3 days, 5 hours and 10 minutes)

On March 1st at 12pm EST, 3,056 people will embark on a 30 day challenge to finally do that thing they’ve been putting off.

We’ll be using Slash - a productivity app made for builder/creators/badasses that helps you stay focused and get sh*t done.

We’ll also have a collective forum where we can post our progress, ask questions and support each other.

And it’s free.

We only ask that you take the challenge seriously, and accept your goal being posted publicly.

Sound good?
